title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
content: My people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. I dey beg ona make ona dey carry us along o. I no say wenÂ  ona dey see wetting we dey talk e no dey make sense to ona but make on dey try dey see us because naso ona Carry start. If na lie I dey talk just reply me and see wetingÂ  Dem go talk.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. My advice for you is to not depend on us, depend on quality posts that you will make for you to rank up. Take time to read than post as a beginner and you will understand the forum the better. If you take a look at my merit history, you will see how non Nigerians are the ones that are sening me most merits that I am receiving. Let us hope that theymos will answer us one day and give us another merit source, but still you will need to depend on yourself making quality posts.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 28, 2023, 06:45:11 PMQuote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. My advice for you is to not depend on us, depend on quality posts that you will make for you to rank up. Take time to read than post as a beginner and you will understand the forum the better. If you take a look at my merit history, you will see how non Nigerians are the ones that are sening me most merits that I am receiving. Let us hope that theymos will answer us one day and give us another merit source, but still you will need to depend on yourself making quality posts.I thank you for the advice. Merit is not really everything. Just like you said now reading and understand post and also understand the forum very well. not just posting anything. You must post quality article that will attract people . And also self dependent not relying on people. Another thing there is that most people always mind there business. No room to private chat anybody just O.Y.O (on your own)Â  many people were ban because nobody to guide them properly. Every body want to meet up. So the porpos of this topic is for many people who don't know who to talk to speak out there minds.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Where you go before? Yes it has been like this from the beginning so no be you start am all of us start am di you start. So no think say we dey sideline you  all what you need to do be say,Â  go and read the forum rules and local board rules. Please no Merit begging in the forum, ask your mentor. And there are two things you need to do to rank up since rank up na di problem you have now. One of di things you go do to go up na to post quality posts, dat is, you need to learn well and tell people weti u don learn and dat is quality contribution. One thing you have to know be say, you are here to learn bitcoin because you don't know am and when you don learn well then you come dey teach people wey no know again and na so you go dey climb up small small dey go.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: My people na true wet dis our brother they talk o, so far as life dey concern before we become great we need one another back.Una don see how our society be so if we no help ourselves no body ready help us o.So any how wey e b make those of Una wey know about this bit coin dey try to dey put us through small small so that we too go be like Una so that we go carry other people along too na so the life be o

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Well done Chief. All of us get different ways wey we take see the forum and our reason for being here. And na only you sabi wetin dey your mind wey carry you come here. I nor go lie give you in as much as say we get Naija board here, the truth be say na all man for their self o. Na only when you don carry yourself well before anybody go look your side. Like Charles don talk already to get merit if na wetin you mean by your post dey very easy. You gat read inside and outside the forum wella. Your aim na to pass better information wey make sense or ask or answer people questions well too. Lastly make you nore fear newbie today go turn Legandary member tomorrow ...na just hardwork and time e go take. Doh.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on August 29, 2023, 07:41:19 AMLastly make you nore fear newbie today go turn Legandary member tomorrow ...na just hardwork and time e go take. Doh.Na the key word be this. No body sideline anybody because all man dey hussle too even those wey you see for up , so you still need to focus and keep moving while understanding how e dey go. The Naija forum wey dey now self dey help unlike before. So make you dey look front and show commitment with post wey person fit show interest. No where dey easy, so if you find yourself here, learn, work and grow.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Bros,make you no reason am. Life na step by step and likewise learning. If as you come everybody knack you merits,ASAP. You don get 100 merits,how you win take learn to know. You go feel say he dey useless to learn and you fit even abuse the help. If only you know say nobody dey to help you but na you need to put effort learn and grow yourself. You go take learning serious and DYOR so that you go get knowledge to use grow yourself, and before you know am,when people begin see that knowledge in you base your contributions, na so them go run help you grow. Success get family but failure no get anybody. A newbie can even kbiw more than a Legendary member tomorrow but na how you take involve yourself to learn,know and teach.

comments.author: Bebe22
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on August 29, 2023, 07:41:19 AMLastly make you nore fear newbie today go turn Legandary member tomorrow ...na just hardwork and time e go take. Doh.Nothing sweet me for this thread pass this line. If you focus on actually learning and educating others, you won't even know how and where the merits would come from, but they would come. Me sef been dey newbie rank, but with time and effort, I don enter jr member. After small time again, I go move, na so the thing be. So no stress or depend on another person, just do your part leave the rest for God

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. I dey beg ona make ona dey carry us along o. I no say wen Â ona dey see wetting we dey talk e no dey make sense to ona but make on dey try dey see us because naso ona Carry start. If na lie I dey talk just reply me and see weting Â Dem go talk. Usually you no suppose wait make person marry wife give you and also come in-pregnant am give you again so that she go born give you the baby, like the wey i dey post here after i join this forum na so my case close and really hard be say me no too come online to come post for almost one year but na so me come back dey begin deep my eyes to read post. Normally for you to succeed here or rank up, you must leave any other work and any other bad news that will distract you from focusing to read things here then recreate your thinkin faculty and know that anything is possible. If you are having this mindset of becoming Legendry overnight know that is not possible because you must pass through stages, na so every single person pass here including me wey dey talk like this, try to read wetin others talk and involved your self with serious discussion.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. I no dey sure say high rank people wey dey here dey side line anybody, anything wey u need if u ask, people dey here wey ready advice you on Wetin u go do, but if you no ask nobody go know Wetin u need, nobody go spoon feed u for here ooo, na only support you go get from here which am sure everybody wey dey here ready to support you. So I donâ€™t know Wetin u mean by dem dey ignore newbies and dey go push person go front come ignore d person, me self na newbie I be before, and people really help me here, because I share informations here and anything wey I need I go also ask and people dey answer me, atleast I dey grow now and dis local board contribute.

comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. I no say wenÂ  ona dey see wetting we dey talk e no dey make sense to ona but make on dey try dey see us because naso ona Carry start. If na lie I dey talk just reply me and see wetingÂ  Dem go talk. My brother this place na gradual process, as you can see you self don the move small small na so e de be for here.If you attempt to learn them go carry you along and you will learn and know how the forum they be but some of us go rely say dem legendary guys go rank us up which no be true because them need see our effort before them support us.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? If na lie I dey talk just reply me and see wetingÂ  Dem go talk.  The forum is meant for everyone to hustle and not to depends on anyone. So that your phrase, should be cancelled. Just rely on yourself and not others. Read more to learn more as others have said, I was like you with empty brain in the forum, nothing come from me about bitcoin but I read and learn from others. Even now I am begging people to teach me more on the areas I know that I am weak. So learning in di forum never end. Since you can read and write then very soon you will know things in the forum if you are serious.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: SmartGold01 on August 29, 2023, 12:04:21 PMQuote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Usually you no suppose wait make person marry wife give you and also come in-pregnant am give you again so that she go born give you the baby, like the wey i dey post here after i join this forum na so my case close and really hard be say me no too come online to come post for almost one year but na so me come back dey begin deep my eyes to read post. Normally for you to succeed here or rank up, you must leave any other work and any other bad news that will distract you from focusing to read things here then recreate your thinkin faculty and know that anything is possible. If you are having this mindset of becoming Legendry overnight know that is not possible because you must pass through stages, na so every single person pass here including me wey dey talk like this, try to read wetin others talk and involved your self with serious discussion..Haha. That one na true Sha. But I just want drag your attention to learn more. Like as many people dey talk for here say na hard work and consistency naim go make person level up. From ona comment for here I don also learn another things. Another person say make I no allow distraction affect me. Because the business is more of creativity and reading. If you fail to read you know go understand, reading is one thing and understanding is another thing. If you lack the skills to understand a very big problem. (comprehension) I don learn many things ona Weldon.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: This is the very essence of life. I feel we cannot really say we succeeded in life if we can not impacted the lives of others positively. You must not have everything in life before you make someone smile... just that little push might be all someone need to overcome a major challenge or achieve a major milestone. From my experience, I have never seen one person that went down because he helped others; instead, there are countless number of persons actually succeeded because they helped others when they had the opportunity. Just like they say, life is a circle and the measure of love and support we give out, comes back to us in different ways and form. In our every changing world where the love of many is waxing cold, we should endeavor to keep in mind that " we rise by lifting others"

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.created_time: August 29, 2023, 02:58:02 PMLast edit: August 29, 2023, 03:14:08 PM by Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 28, 2023, 06:45:11 PMQuote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. My advice for you is to not depend on us, depend on quality posts that you will make for you to rank up. Take time to read than post as a beginner and you will understand the forum the better. If you take a look at my merit history, you will see how non Nigerians are the ones that are sening me most merits that I am receiving. Let us hope that theymos will answer us one day and give us another merit source, but still you will need to depend on yourself making quality posts..Yes it's true. The most difficult task as a beginner is reading. When I was introduced to this platform, I love the platform but to dedicate my time to read was a very big problem. If I read1..2..3 lines am tired. it's like someone was forcing me to do something I don't want. But I ask myself is this how you are going to succeed? People who has been here for long never get tired why must it be you? For one to succeed u must work smart to achieve what you want.There are many factor that determine ones success.1) work smart2) always have that mindset that you will make it and work on it.3) consistency4) chose your friend don't let friend chose you. Because a bad friend is a bad influence.5) always make good use of your time, time na money.6)Don't always think there is time.7) don't always ague about what you don't know.  try new things. Don't always use because the last thing you do did not favour you and say you will not try again.There are many to emphasise on but I choose these few.

Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Usually you no suppose wait make person marry wife give you and also come in-pregnant am give you again so that she go born give you the baby, like the wey i dey post here after i join this forum na so my case close and really hard be say me no too come online to come post for almost one year but na so me come back dey begin deep my eyes to read post. Normally for you to succeed here or rank up, you must leave any other work and any other bad news that will distract you from focusing to read things here then recreate your thinkin faculty and know that anything is possible. If you are having this mindset of becoming Legendry overnight know that is not possible because you must pass through stages, na so every single person pass here including me wey dey talk like this, try to read wetin others talk and involved your self with serious discussion..Haha. That one na true Sha. But I just want drag your attention to learn more. Like as many people dey talk for here say na hard work and consistency naim go make person level up. From ona comment for here I don also learn another things. Another person say make I no allow distraction affect me. Because the business is more of creativity and reading. If you fail to read you know go understand, reading is one thing and understanding is another thing. If you lack the skills to understand a very big problem. (comprehension) I don learn many things ona Weldon. That is the reason why we have locals, if you raised a topic of your concerned people would look into it and give you accurate answer or a precise response, if you read and you are lost in any point or any place don't be shy to ask questions or even call people's attention across we local because I believe here builds us more stronger than any other board. If you are well cooked over here I don't think anything may be of concern to you while expanding your hands to other boards.Bro no big man or Seniority here, we are all here to impact and also learned from people.. and the most surprising thing is that I had just learned what I never learnt before and I am very happy, if that I didn't open up how could I had known it today. You can view my profile read through.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 29, 2023, 02:58:02 PMThere are many factor that determine ones success.1) work smart2) always have that mindset that you will make it and work on it.3) consistency4) chose your friend don't let friend chose you. Because a bad friend is a bad influence.5) always make good use of your time, time na money.6)Don't always think there is time.7) don't always ague about what you don't know.  try new things. Don't always use because the last thing you do did not favour you and say you will not try again.There are many to emphasise on but I choose these few.Hmm! So you mean you understood all these concept, and yet you go about complaining people no dey carry "Newbies" along? Or abi you forgot say you are just 16 days old on the forum, and as such merit should have been the last thing to even be on your mind sef, because you still have a whole lot of things to learn and a long way to go on this forum. So abeg, as a brother wey I be, I go only advise you to just take an jejeli and whiyoli, and flow with the forum as time goes on. And secondly, please don't be tired of reading, because it is in reading more, we learn to know more.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on August 28, 2023, 05:50:55 PMMy people I done come again o. Life of a newbie can be boring at timesðŸ˜„ðŸ˜„. but the question be say how ona wey be legendary/oga dey carry newbies along. because I see say ona dey always ignore new menbers. Naso ona dey do? Ona go push person enter front come leave am behind bars. I dey beg ona make ona dey carry us along o. I no say wen Â ona dey see wetting we dey talk e no dey make sense to ona but make on dey try dey see us because naso ona Carry start. If na lie I dey talk just reply me and see weting Â Dem go talk. I kno say you we all need merit to rank up but my advice be say no carry am for head like gala if not you fit put yourself for trouble. Just take your time dey read and make positive contributions and di merit go come. Make I take Charles-tim do example, if you look through him first 100 posts wey him make for di forum and him recent posts you go see di wide gap in knowledge. E no just happen by chance, e happen as a result of reading and learning. According to one of BrainBoss post wey him talk say reputation matter for di forum and na true, I no really need to go into details. You fit build a reputation here, if you wan learn skill or e get person wey you dey look up to as a role model, you fit reach out to di person and I believe di person go dey kind enough to guide you. Me sef dey learn too, so just take am easy dey go through di learning process.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Bebe22 on August 29, 2023, 11:00:40 AMQuote from: Davidvictorson on August 29, 2023, 07:41:19 AMLastly make you nore fear newbie today go turn Legandary member tomorrow ...na just hardwork and time e go take. Doh.Nothing sweet me for this thread pass this line. If you focus on actually learning and educating others, you won't even know how and where the merits would come from, but they would come. Me sef been dey newbie rank, but with time and effort, I don enter jr member. After small time again, I go move, na so the thing be. So no stress or depend on another person, just do your part leave the rest for God I agree with the part you mentioned none dependant on any person,Â  is best you put in you efforts in building yourself rather than to waste time depending on another person because in reality you are the so propeller of your journey here in the forum. Another point I will like to emphasize on it in the area of over focusing on merits,Â  this doesn't make too much sense in the long run,Â  because we have some members here,Â  that instead of focusing on personal development and working to improve their work here,Â  they focus so much on the merit so at the end,Â  they accumulate tons of merits but lack the needed quality to sustain that level,Â  and in no distance time wether they be Hero,Â  Legendary or full member,Â  the still end up not being useful on anything around the forum even though they spend many years in the forum. So it not how far but how well,Â  and I am glad newbies of this days are beginning to realize this fact that of quality before quantity, so the goal is self development first.
